name: attack
note:
<setup action>
display action
immortal: targets, true
</setup action>
<target action>

if user.attackMotion()== 'swing' 
 move user: targets, front, 20
else if user.attackMotion()=='thrust'
move user: targets, front, 20
else
perform start
end
wait for movement
face user: forward
motion attack: user
face user: forward
if user.isStateAffected(24)
animation 8: target
else
attack animation: target
end
face user: forward
action effect
</target action>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

name: dual attack
note:

display action

<whole action>

   </whole action>
<target action>
move user: target, front, 20, auto offset x -100
wait for movement
motion thrust: user
wait for movement
animation 0123: user
wait for animation
death break
motion attack: user
wait for movement
action animation: target
wait for animation
death break
action effect
action effect
</target action>

<follow action>
</follow action>

<finish action>
perform finish
immortal: target flase
clear battle log
</fishih action>

name: shadow slash
note:
<setup action>
immortal: targets ture
display action
</setup action>
<target action>
move user: target, front, 20
wait for movement

action animation: target
move user: target, back, 2
ANIMATION WAIT: 2
wait for movement
face user: away from target
move user: target,front base, 2
ANIMATION WAIT: 2
wait for movemnet
face user: away from target
move user: target, head, 2
ANIMATION WAIT: 2
wait for movement
face user: away from target
move user: target, back base,2
ANIMATION WAIT: 2
wait for movement
face user: away from target
move user: target, front center, 2
action effect: target
action effect: target
action effect: target
action effect: target
action effect: target
</target action>
<finish action>
perform finish
immortal: target, flase
clear battle log
</finish action>
